languages.text: {n}Техножрец разворачивает инфопластину к вам. Его вид-скрин покрыт зелеными рунами, пляшущими богопротивный вычислительный танец.{/n}
{n}The Tech-Priest turns his data-slate around. Its vid-screen is covered with green runes performing an ungodly dance of computation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец разворачивает инфопластину к вам. Его вид-скрин покрыт зелеными рунами, пляшущими богопротивный вычислительный танец.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技術司祭がデータスレートを回す。スクリーンは緑のルーンで覆われており、計算の邪悪なダンスを踊っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest turns his data-slate around. Its vid-screen is covered with green runes performing an ungodly dance of computation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭がデータスレートを回す。スクリーンは緑のルーンで覆われており、計算の邪悪なダンスを踊っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}德曼兹转过了他的数据板。视讯屏幕上覆满了绿色的符号，它们仿佛在跳着邪恶的计算之舞。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest turns his data-slate around. Its vid-screen is covered with green runes performing an ungodly dance of computation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}德曼兹转过了他的数据板。视讯屏幕上覆满了绿色的符号，它们仿佛在跳着邪恶的计算之舞。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester dreht seinen Datablock um. Sein Vid-Bildschirm ist voller grüner Runen, die einen gottlosen Tanz von Computerberechnungen durchführen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest turns his data-slate around. Its vid-screen is covered with green runes performing an ungodly dance of computation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester dreht seinen Datablock um. Sein Vid-Bildschirm ist voller grüner Runen, die einen gottlosen Tanz von Computerberechnungen durchführen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre tourne vers vous l'écran de sa plaque de données. Il est couvert de runes vertes décrivant une ronde mathématique impie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest turns his data-slate around. Its vid-screen is covered with green runes performing an ungodly dance of computation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre tourne vers vous l'écran de sa plaque de données. Il est couvert de runes vertes décrivant une ronde mathématique impie.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote pone del revés su tablilla de datos. La videopantalla está cubierta de runas verdes que ejecutan una impía danza computacional.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest turns his data-slate around. Its vid-screen is covered with green runes performing an ungodly dance of computation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote pone del revés su tablilla de datos. La videopantalla está cubierta de runas verdes que ejecutan una impía danza computacional.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, databelasını çeviriyor. Video ekranı; hesaplamalardan oluşan, din dışı bir dans sergileyen, yeşil rünlerle kaplı.{/n}
